original_text: That in the day that I shall visit the transgressions of Israel upon him I will also visit the altars of Bethel: and the horns of the altar shall be cut off, and fall to the ground.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘의 모든 죄를 보응하는 날에 벧엘의 제단들을 벌하여 그 제단의 뿔들을 꺾어 땅에 떨어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: That in the day that I shall visit
the transgressions of Israel upon him
I will also visit the altars of Bethel:
and the horns of the altar
shall be cut off, and fall to the ground.
